Articles.Content: Does anybody know when Kerbal Space Program will release on the Xbox One? I'm hoping its in time for Christmas as I'm looking to buy it.

Hello there, @Olliemcogster, it's great to have you with us! We are all hoping for a release as soon as possible, but it has taken a very long time so far because they decided to scrap the previous one entirely and start again from scratch. Nobody knows the release date, unfortunately. You should find all the latest news here and whenever a new "KSP Weekly" comes out in the section near the top of the forum called "The Daily Kerbal".

I locked this thread because the question has been asked quite a few times already, but that's no problem at all. You are welcome to join the discussion in the thread I linked above, if you like
